TopicTitle: What do I need on the tech tree to enable MechJeb Autopilot?

Articles.Content: I just got Advanced Flight control and thought that was going to do it. But I'm not seeing it. Shouldn't the list of options unfold automatically or do I have to click something in the MechJeb basic menu?
Mod question moved to the modding subforum.

I just got Advanced Flight control and thought that was going to do it. But I'm not seeing it. Shouldn't the list of options unfold automatically or do I have to click something in the MechJeb basic menu?
In career mode, you have to unlock the mj features individually on the tech tree once you buy the first one i think it has ascent auto then you buy rendezvous then rover auto then etc... But buying just the case at first doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t give any features. So its not a glitch or anything.
